page.title: 10Visitors-results of a survey
page.content: All accomodation is owned by the National Trust and leased by the Landmark Trust. Visitors come from all over the British Isles and abroad.There were visitors from America during our stay. The helicopter service was the most popular means of transport to the island and the majority were staying for one weeks holiday.For many it was their first visit but the rest had been regular visitors for many years. Everybody was happy with their accomodation.The island was much as they had expected it to be and everybody wanted it kept like that. The advantages of the island most frequently stated were the peace and quiet,unchanged landscape,the beauty,the freedom to explore,the lack of traffic and the friendliness of the people. {Joanne Castleton.
